short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quizzical is a browser extension that helps users improve their learning efficiency.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quizzical 是一款帮助用户提高学习效率的浏览器插件。通过定期在新标签页上展示精选的问题与答案，用户可以在闲暇之余随时学习和巩固知识。插件提供了阅读模式和答题模式，以满足不同用户的需求。用户可以自定义每日问题数量，上传自己的题库文件，并选择是否始终显示问题。Quizzical 助您在轻松愉快的学习过程中实现知识积累和巩固。
具体的使用的方法请安装后点击插件进行设置题库与相关参数~
Quizzical is a browser extension designed to enhance users' learning efficiency. By periodically displaying curated questions and answers on new tabs, users can learn and consolidate knowledge during their spare time. The extension offers both reading and answering modes to cater to different users' preferences. Users can customize the daily question count, upload their own question banks, and choose whether to always display questions. Quizzical helps you accumulate and reinforce knowledge through an enjoyable and effortless learning experience.
